SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.math.quaternion

Class Quaternion

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.math.vector.Vector4
civitas.celestis.math.quaternion.Quaternion
All Implemented Interfaces:
Vector, Serializable
public final class Quaternion extends Vector4
A quaternion is used to represent the rotation of a Vector3.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Field Details

    • IDENTITY

      public static final Quaternion IDENTITY
      The identity quaternion. This represents no rotation.

  • Constructor Details

    • Quaternion

      public Quaternion(double w, double x, double y, double z)
      Creates a new quaternion from four component scalars.
      Parameters:
      w - The W component of this quaternion
      x - The X component of this quaternion
      y - The Y component of this quaternion
      z - The Z component of this quaternion

    • Quaternion

      public Quaternion(double s, @Nonnull Vector3 v)
      Creates a new quaternion from a scalar and a vector.
      Parameters:
      s - Scalar part of this quaternion
      v - Vector part of this quaternion

    • Quaternion

      public Quaternion(@Nonnull double[] values)
      Creates a new quaternion from an array of component scalars. The length of the array must be equal to 4.
      Parameters:
      values - Array of values to use to construct this quaternion

    • Quaternion

      public Quaternion(@Nonnull Vector4 other)
      Creates a new quaternion by copying the values of a Vector4. (or another quaternion)
      Parameters:
      other - Vector to copy the values of

  • Method Details

    • builder

      @Nonnull public static Quaternion.Builder builder()
      Returns a new builder instance.
      Returns:
      A new builder instance

    • vector

      @Nonnull public Vector3 vector()
      Returns the vector part of this quaternion.
      Returns:
      The vector part of this quaternion

    • pitch

      public double pitch()
      Calculates the pitch angle (rotation around the X-axis) from this Quaternion.
      Returns:
      The pitch angle in radians

    • yaw

      public double yaw()
      Calculates the yaw angle (rotation around the Y-axis) from this Quaternion.
      Returns:
      The yaw angle in radians

    • roll

      public double roll()
      Calculates the roll angle (rotation around the Z-axis) from this Quaternion.
      Returns:
      The roll angle in radians

    • axis

      @Nonnull public Vector3 axis()
      Calculates the axis of rotation represented by this quaternion. If this quaternion represents no rotation, this returns Vector3.ZERO.
      Returns:
      The axis of rotation represented by this quaternion

    • angle

      public double angle()
      Calculates the angle in radians of rotation represented by this quaternion. If this quaternion represents no rotation, this returns 0.
      Returns:
      The angle in radians of rotation represented by this quaternion

    • scale

      @Nonnull public Quaternion scale(double s)
      Given this quaternion is a rotation quaternion (a quaternion with a magnitude of 1), this scales the rotation of the quaternion by the provided scalar.
      Parameters:
      s - Scalar to scale this quaternion by
      Returns:
      Scaled quaternion

    • multiply

      @Nonnull public Quaternion multiply(@Nonnull Quaternion q)
      Multiplies this quaternion by another quaternion. Note that quaternion multiplication is non-commutative. (the order of the operation matters) This is an operation where this is on the left, and q is on the right.
      Parameters:
      q - The quaternion to multiply this quaternion by
      Returns:
      The left-product of the two quaternions

    • conjugate

      @Nonnull public Quaternion conjugate()
      Returns the conjugate of this quaternion.
      Returns:
      The conjugate of this quaternion

    • inverse

      @Nonnull public Quaternion inverse() throws UnsupportedOperationException
      Returns the inverse of this quaternion.
      Returns:
      The inverse of this quaternion
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - When the magnitude of this is equal to 0

    • toBuilder

      @Nonnull public Quaternion.Builder toBuilder()
      Converts this quaternion into a builder for modification.
      Returns:
      Builder constructed from this quaternion

    • parseQuaternion

      @Nonnull public static Quaternion parseQuaternion(@Nonnull String input) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Parses a string into a Quaternion.
      Parameters:
      input - String to parse into a quaternion
      Returns:
      The parsed string
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - When the format is invalid
      IllegalArgumentException - When at least one of ths components is non-finite
